source.query:
<fetch>  
   <entity name='msdynmkt_email'> 
     <attribute name='msdynmkt_emailid'/>  
     <attribute name='msdynmkt_name'/>   
     <attribute name='msdynmkt_subject'/>   
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_fromemail'/>
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_fromname'/> 
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_previewtext'/> 
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_replytoemail'/>
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_emailbody'/>
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_designerhtml'/>
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_previewhtml'/>
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_placeholders'/> 
	 <attribute name='msdynmkt_textpart'/>
	 <attribute name='createdon'/>
	 <attribute name='modifiedon'/> 
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute='modifiedon' operator="olderthan-x-days" value="1" />
</filter>    
   </entity>   
</fetch>
